Title: Tsumetai nettaigyo
Actors: Mitsuru Fukikoshi, Denden, Asuka Kurosawa, Megumi Kagurazaka
Plot: When Syamoto's teenage daughter is caught stealing, a generous middle-aged man helps resolve the situation. The man and his wife offer to have Syamoto's troublesome daughter work at their fish store. Syamoto soon discovers the horrific truth of the seemingly perfect couple.
